p: Recently there has been tremendous research interest in COVID-19 focusing on its spread [ [1], [2], [3], [4], [5], [6], [7], [8]], origin and genomic structure [ [9], [10], [11], [12], [13], [14], [15]], clinical characteristics [ [16], [17], [18]], and drug discovery [ 13, [19], [20], [21]]. Particularly the interest is significant after the start of COVID-19 in late December 2019. Some of the important research results are described in the following.
